source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Monarch Butterfly 2.0
items.headline: 101 Reasons to Love Our Favorite Orange and Black Butterfly From A to Z
objectives_summary: Monarch Butterfly 2.0

items.title: The Ultimate Course of Handmade Ankara Bags
items.headline: Step by step training
objectives_summary: How to access common crafting tools.
How to identify/source for crafting materials.
Sketching out Ankara bag designs.

items.title: House and Building Portraits: Line and Wash Essentials
items.headline: Learn how to draw and paint a portrait of any building. Included: 6 full demonstrations with narrated instructions.
objectives_summary: How to paint a portrait of a building. Learn how to draw and paint any building from a reference photo or plein air.
How to draw simple to complex buildings with a pen, and how to use watercolor to imply light, shade and mood with a variety of colors.
Learn how to hold your pen for different effects, draw basic lines and shapes, how to create depth and light/darkness in your drawing.

items.title: One stroke painting for beginners and intermediate level.
items.headline: One stroke painting with acrylic paint.
objectives_summary: One stroke painting
Acrylic painting of flowers

items.headline: Easy to learn magic. Magic tricks with any object. Instant magician
objectives_summary: magic tricks
close up magic
magic tutorials

items.title: Touch the Sky Acrylic Painting Lesson
items.headline: a step by step acrylic lesson!
objectives_summary: how to make a colorful and bright acrylic painting

items.title: Painting Architecture in Watercolor: Complex to Simple
items.headline: Learn How to Paint 4 Classic Architectural Landscapes In Watercolor
objectives_summary: How to paint complex architectural landscapes in watercolor from a photograph. I'll show you how to reduce a scene down to essentials and pick out elements and objects of focus.
Layering - learn how you only need 2-3 layers in order to complete a watercolor painting.
How to use colour effectively to create areas of interest to portray the mood of a scene.

items.title: Planning Your Painting: Plan, Sketch and Paint 6 Paintings
items.headline: Learn how to turn any reference photo into a watercolor painting through planning, sketching and composing a scene.
objectives_summary: How to turn any landscape photograph or scene into a painting.
How to create a quick pencil and watercolour sketch of your photograph or scene to ease into the painting process, and use your sketch as the basis of your final painting.
How to use different watercolour techniques such as wet-in-wet, wet-on-dry, dry brush and how to get different brush marks to imply areas of texture and foliage.

items.headline: Introduction to Comic Books, Part 2!
objectives_summary: Basics of Comic Book Panel Directing

Timing in comic books

items.headline: Sell Your Digital Art Online

items.title: Oil Painting Portrait Course - Beautiful Women & The Man
items.headline: In this course you will learn a simple and effective method to create 2 Big oil portrait painting.
objectives_summary: A process and structure to creating 2 face painting from start to finish, Easy for anyone to manage.
How painting in layers works starting  and you’ll learn how to bring an oil painting.
You’ll learn how to use  color that will make mixing any color imaginable easy.

items.title: Learn to Draw Automobiles (Cars,Trucks & Buses) from Scratch
items.headline: This is "How to draw" related automobiles course.Can be drawn easily with Pencils.It comes with my basic voice prompts.
objectives_summary: Students will learn to draw various drawings in simple steps.
Students will learn to draw various drawings from scratch usually an eye or a face as starting point.
Students will learn how to draw elegant drawings of various automobiles.

items.title: Exploring Watercolor Grounds
items.headline: Let's explore working with watercolor grounds on wood
objectives_summary: Real-time painting of a loose, impressionistic, rocks on watercolor grounds with watercolor and gouache!
Basic watercolor techniques such as wet on wet, and wet on dry.
To focus on art for relaxation and enjoyment.

items.title: Rectangular Fabric In 5 Chic Styles! (For Beginners)
items.headline: Sewing can be easy with straight lines.
objectives_summary: How to create amazing projects with straight lines.
How to create amazing projects with straight lines. Confidence to try more simple projects on your own.
Sew your very own clothes without complicated sewing patterns.
